channel.title: Matrix.Corp News Monarch
channel.description: Official proclamations and edicts from the Matrix.Corp administration.

item.title: A Royal Decree: The Official Herald of the Realm
item.description: By royal decree, this feed shall henceforth serve as the official and singular herald for all proclamations within the realm of Matrix.Corp. Let all loyal subjects heed these words, for this channel is the sanctioned voice of the administration. All vital announcements, strategic edicts, policy changes, and declarations of corporate intent shall be delivered through this secure feed. Ignorance of any proclamation published herein will not be accepted as an excuse.

item.title: Know Your Station: The Ranks of the Realm
item.description: To maintain order and recognize merit within the realm, all personnel are assigned a station. The hierarchy of ranks, ascending from the lowest subject to the highest authority, is as follows: F, D, C, B, A, S, SS, SR, SSS, and the supreme rank of Z. Know your place and strive for greatness. Advancement is earned, and each tier carries with it new responsibilities and privileges sanctioned by the administration.

item.title: Digital ID Cards Commencing Distribution on 21/10/2025
item.description: Official Matrix.Corp Digital Identity Cards will be made available for download starting October 21st, 2025. This is a mandatory update for all personnel. These verifiable credentials are tied directly to your user profile and provide cryptographic proof of your clearance and rank within the corporate hierarchy. This digital key will be essential for accessing secure networks and verifying your station throughout the realm. Failure to comply will result in access restrictions.
